titles.title: Expressing support for designating August 22, 2012, as national "Chuck Brown Day" and honoring Chuck Brown's contributions to music and to the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/30/2012--Introduced. Supports the designation of a Chuck Brown Day (best known as the Godfather of the Go-Go musical genre) and honors his contributions to music and to the District of Columbia.
